column4: Hi folks, can someone help me please? I am here in a datacentre at a server and need some WWW-Research (have no GUI here, so cannot browse)
May want to virtualize a GUI and encrypt-stream it to an approved box.
later on it will be possible, i am setting up this box right now and have only console
bring your laptop in w/ 3G/4G/WiFi, and set up a temp stand next to your console.
